We used a process to adjudicate eligibility for Covid vaccines that was optimized for making decisions on childhood immunization schedule. By design it’s deliberative and surfaces conflict. It works well for its intended goals but we used a peacetime process in a wartime setting. https://t.co/YI8JRtvp82

Thanks @CNNSitRoom for having me on to discuss “Uncontrolled Spread.” At COVID’s outset, we had to scale a public health response to match magnitude of crisis; reimagine old processes. Maybe we should have aligned FDA and CDC from outset in a seamless process to avoid conflicts. https://t.co/UT0k5c7VBE
